title: Burn
description: The exciting conclusion of the 4-book series The Stark Affair  When Colton Stark shares details of his secret plans with her, Sofia cannot help but fall instantly in love. Any doubt she had about him is washed away in one fateful morning.  But she doesn't know he's activated his escape plan, speeding toward a Go-Fast boat in Key Largo that's going to take him to a new life and identity in South America... away from her forever.  Sofia takes matters into her own hands, forging a plan to save them... not just from those trying to kill them, but from their own selves.
author: Skylar Cross
